resources.string: The Bhagavad Gita, also known as the Gita, is a 700-verse Hindu scripture that is part of the Mahabharata epic. The Gita is set in the Kurukshetra battlefield, and tells the story of a conversation between the warrior prince .
No Internet connection \n Check saved chapters in Setting
धृतराष्ट्र उवाच धर्मक्षेत्रे कुरुक्षेत्रे समवेता युयुत्सवः। मामकाः पाण्डवाश्चैव किमकुर्वत सञ्जय।।1.1।।
